title: Function loading an array, then returning multiple values in C?
body:
I got an assignment that I need to complete till tomorrow 12 am to write a function that loads an array of n numbers, then returns arithmetic mean and largest number in array.

How to I do that? I tried, but function simply crashes. Tried reading up about different methods, but none worked. Everything is working fine, while in main, but crashes when trying to use it as function.

Please help.
